entry.source: Laws mandated by arrogant authorities have no{F801}place in the paradise humans should strive for.{F801}{F804,5}Go to the Yamato Perpetual Reactor in Camp{F801}Ichigaya{F804,0} and open the {F804,5}gate to the Expanse.{F804,0}{F801}There's no need to worry. It'll be easy as{F801}kissing a woman with her eyes closed before you.{F801}
